item.title: Killzone 3 Open Beta
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Bloodshot:

I played the beta for several hours with a friend. The game is definitely way better than KZ2. Sure, I don’t like some of the design choices for the soldiers and weapons, but the gameplay is pretty solid, and that’s what matters. Only thing I really dislike about it, is how when you melee it goes into this cinematic kill bullcrap where you stab them in the chest with a knife, or slit their throat, etc. I don’t even know how it works, except that most of the time, it happens when i bash from the front. Usually when I hit a guy in the back, I hit him with my gun.

It only happens when you hold the button down. Something that’s hard not to do when you have to push down the same button you use to aim.

God damn I wish console games had more customizable controls. Like the valve console ports.

Read full topic

item.title: Killzone 3 Open Beta
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
/\ This, but

When you jump off of anything that hurts you even a little it fills up the bottom of the screen completely. Makes jumping off of stuff annoying.

item.title: Killzone 3 Open Beta

item.description:

item.title: Killzone 3 Open Beta
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
Zdue19:

Multiplayer is epic :3

I played the beta for several hours with a friend. The game is definitely way better than KZ2. Sure, I don’t like some of the design choices for the soldiers and weapons, but the gameplay is pretty solid, and that’s what matters. Only thing I really dislike about it, is how when you melee it goes into this cinematic kill bullcrap where you stab them in the chest with a knife, or slit their throat, etc. I don’t even know how it works, except that most of the time, it happens when i bash from the front. Usually when I hit a guy in the back, I hit him with my gun.

It’s so stupid when I’m in an intense firefight and I bash someone only to have it go into this long animation which I have no control over only to get shot a quarter of the way through it.

I really like the flow of the gameplay, It was very fluid.
I love the weapon sounds, and this definitely is the best looking console game I’ve ever seen. Some of the textures in this one are quite good quality. We’ll, there’s my 2 cents. I’m going to go to bed now, and hope that the Crysis 2 PC demo comes out (since the xbox demo just finished) and that I have a positive response from playing that too.

Read full topic

item.title: Killzone 3 Open Beta
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Hated KZ2’s controls, and the multiplayer matches always devolved into “who can spam the most sentries in the enemy base”

The beta is much better. I just wish they would get all that fucking god damn COD shit off of the fucking screen. I swear to god. Is it so fucking hard not to have numbers pop up every fucking where when I killed someone? If I want to know my score I’ll fucking hold select. For fuck’s fucking sake.

Read full topic
